Package index

Provider Classes

Main Provider Classes

Main classes for the supported LLM providers

Google
Client for Google's Gemini API
Anthropic
Client for Anthropic's Claude API
OpenAI_Assistant
Client for OpenAI's Assistants API
OpenAI_Chat
Client for OpenAI's Chat Completions API
OpenAI_Responses
Client for OpenAI's Responses API
OpenRouter
Client for the OpenRouter API
LocalLLM
Client for local LLM servers (e.g., llama.cpp, Ollama)

Internal Classes

Parent (internal) classes

Provider
Provider Base Class: shared interface & common functionalities for all LLM providers
OpenAI
Parent class for OpenAI API clients (Responses, Chat Completions, Assistants)

Utilities

Multimodal Inputs

Helper functions for processing different types of inputs

as_text_content() as_image_content() as_file_content() as_pdf_content() as_json_content()
Convert file paths, URLs or R objects to the specified content format before passing it to the LLM API

Tools & Schemas definitions

Helper functions to define tools and schemas for structured outputs using annotations or direct specification

as_tool() tool() schema()
Generate tools and schemas definitions from functions annotations, or direct specification

MCP

Helper functions for MCP integration

mcp_server() mcp_tools() mcp_resources() mcp_prompts()
MCP (Model Context Protocol) Integration
execute_mcp_tool()
Execute an MCP tool

Helpers

Helper functions

flat_list()
Flatten a list of elements to a single-depth list
